name: blitz-mapped
postCreateCommand: bash -lc "git config user.name 'codex-bot' && git config user.email 'codex-bot@users.noreply.github.com' && if [ -n \"$GITHUB_TOKEN\" ]; then git remote set-url origin https://x-access-token:${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/MrBilliams/blitz-mapped.git; fi"
postStartCommand: bash -lc "if [ -n \"$GITHUB_TOKEN\" ]; then git remote set-url origin https://x-access-token:${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/MrBilliams/blitz-mapped.git; fi"
